price: 89. (Xus) Zakariya, markuu u dhawaaqay Rabbigi (isagoo leh):” Rabbiyow! Ha igu dhaafin keli ahaan, Adigaana u Kheyr roon cid wax dhaxasha (u hadha)”.
arabic: وَزَكَرِيَّآ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرۡنِي فَرۡدٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wazakariyyā idh nādā rabbahu rabbi lā tadharnī fardan wa-anta khayru al-wārithīna
